title: if / else if bug
body:
by **t.matt81**: 
If I make a little Programm like this:

a := 1
b := 2
c := 3

if a<b && b<c {
    dosomething1()
} else if a<b {
    dosomething2()
}

Both functions will be executed. But I think that only the first function should be
executed.

I use the compiler 8g (revision 92fcf05736e8 release.2010-09-06/release) on Ubuntu
Netbook Remix
